Hey hey hey! I am Drzony13, but you can call me Drzony13! I am a cool epic bad boy ghost, who vandalizes this site![[footnote]]Well, I did not vandalize it that much, but I HOPEFULLY WILL![[/footnote]] 

Also, I'm a writer on [http://scp-pl.wikidot.com SCP-PL] and I'm much more active there.

What kind of things I write? Well, I joined -PL with intention of writing horrors, but I ended up doing variety of stuff. On -PL I'm mostly known of [http://scp-pl.wikidot.com/list-do-mikolaja List do Mikołaja],[[footnote]]Letter to Santa (Horror about [[[SCP-4666]]])[[/footnote]] [http://scp-pl.wikidot.com/scp-pl-291 SCP-PL-291 — Jerma Dollhouse 2][[footnote]]Well, the title speaks for itself.[[/footnote]] and [http://scp-pl.wikidot.com/scp-pl-305 SCP-PL-305 — Annoying Little Dipshit].[[footnote]]An annoying brat who eats files in Foundation's databases just to spite them. In the end, he destroyed all the Foundation's databases, forcing them to use only paper copies of documents.[[/footnote]] But to be honest, I feel much more comfortable with writing tales, rather than articles, due to much bigger freedom regarding form and content. That's even why on -PL I have only two articles and rest are tales, while here by now I only have two comics.

Well, that will be it! NEXT:
